Title: Chapter Three: Blue Religion
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Diane Frolov (teleplay by), Andrew Schneider (teleplay by), Joe Gonzalez (staff writer), Chris Wu (script coordinator)

Plot: After the young victim in the bones case is identified, Bosch and J. Edgar are pulled into the troubled world of the boy's family. As Bosch's own trial escalates, his romance with Brasher ...
